definition: to mount an electronic valve/to plug in a bulb

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards
seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects

sentences.english: While a pair of hollow jacks without electrodes are correspondingly and additionally arranged on the lamp base.
sentences.chinese: 而在管座上對應地增設了一對不帶電極的空心插孔。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a double filament fluorescent lamp and a lamp base.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型是一種雙燈絲熒光燈管及管座。

sentences.english: After sealing the header is cleaned and then the leads are clipped to the desired length.
sentences.chinese: 封焊後把管座清洗乾淨，然後把引線剪到所需長度。

sentences.english: The technology of precision casting for nozzles in fuel assembly is described.
sentences.chinese: 敘述了燃料組件管座的精密鑄造工藝特點。

definition: CRT used in TV or computer monitor/picture tube/kinescope
rectifier (transforming alternating electric current to direct current)
abbr. for 搭鐵接線|搭铁接线/chassis grounding (i.e. using the chassis as ground, to serve as a return path for current in an electric circuit)
case, casing, cabinet or housing (of a computer, photocopier etc)
electric light socket/burner (component of a kerosene lamp)/light (as a countable item, e.g. number of lights fitted in a house)
